articles.title: McDonald's appoints Rashmika Mandanna as brand ambassador - Mint
articles.description: The company said the association marks a significant step for McDonald‘s as it looks to reinforce its brand leadership in its key markets
articles.content: McDonalds India (West and South) on Friday said has appointed film actor Rashmika Mandanna as its brand ambassador. McDonalds restaurants in West and South India are operated by Westlife Development … [+1192 chars]

articles.title: Policybazaar to merge with Info Edge unit enroute to IPO - VCCircle
articles.description: PB Fintech, which runs insurance aggregator Policybazaar and others, will merge into Info Edge’s MakeSense Technologies
articles.content:
PB Fintech, which runs insurance aggregator Policybazaar and others, will merge into Info Edges MakeSense Technologies in an all-share deal, the companies said in a joint statement on Friday.
The co… [+1230 chars]

articles.title: Explained: Lower fuel prices may not last beyond elections, hurt BPCL valuation - The Indian Express
articles.description: Petrol and diesel prices in India: A correction in crude oil prices to about $62 per barrel in early April has allowed OMCs to cut the price of petrol and diesel by about 75 paise per litre.

articles.description: “We have gone through, I would say several near-death experiences…We have now arrived today, after three or four big crises into a very healthy shape,” Mittal said at the Amazon Sambhav Summit 2021 on Thursday.
